provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Order may be cited as the Wharfage (Periods of Storage and
Keeping) (Montego Bay) Order, 1972.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. In respect of goods left on a wharf at the Harbour of Kingston after the
period of seven clear days allowed by paragraph (a) of subsection (1) of
section 18 of the Act, additional sums shall be payable for the periods
specified in the Schedule at the respective rates so specified.                 Schedule
                                         SCHEDULE                                (Paragraph 2)
Category of Goods                                                  Daily rates charged after
                                                                    expiration of fiee time

Over 40 "           66

Break bulk
      Per revenue ton
                 [Tlie inclusion of this page is autliorized by L.N. 1712009]

provisions.title: Section 3
provisions.content:
3.-(1) In respect of goods (including lumber, shingles, coal and
patent fuel) stored or kept in transit sheds on a wharf at the Harbour
of Montego Bay after the fixed period, the charges specified in sub-
paragraph (iii) of paragraph (a) and in paragraph (b) of subsection (1)
of section 20 of the Act are hereby varied to the charges specified in the
Schedule.                                                                  Schedule.
      (2) In respect of goods left in open storage (patios) on a whad
as aforesaid the charges shall be one-half those specified in sub-
paragraph (1).
    THE WHARFAGE (ADDITIONAL CHARGES) (MONTEGO BAY)
